name: Cartoon Violets 5
description:
Lesser men would have abandoned it after Cartoon Violets 4,

But not us! our Homicidal Cyborg Mutant is back at it again, Killing men, women, babies, and the Disabled. 

All your favorite characters from Cartoon Violets 4 return,  better than ever before, such as Fatass, Chef Knaystee, and Civilian.  even more new characters mixed in as well!

Content warning: 

Mild Racial Themes

Mild course Language 

Crude Humor

Mild sexual references 

Violence

Tips and Tricks:

Purple Arrows never let you down.

 Start the quests at the Biker shop (The one that says Biker, doofus). 

Stuck with the Well misson? Check the wooden sign near the highway.
